sense.gloss: to blend (e.g. fact and fiction), to mix, to weave (together)
to twist (threads of different colours) together (into a string), to entwine, to interweave
to mix, to combine, to weave together (e.g. fact and fiction), to interweave
to twine (fibers to make rope), to twist
making a cord by entwining threads of various colours

k_ele.e: 泥棒を捕らえて縄を綯う
泥棒を捕らえて縄をなう

r_ele.r: どろぼうをとらえてなわをなう

sense.gloss: starting something in the eleventh hour, have not thy cloak to make when it begins to rain, don't lock the stable door after the horse has been stolen, braiding the rope only after the thief is caught
x: 泥縄式・どろなわしき

to twist (threads of different colours) together (into a string), to entwine, to interweave
to twine (fibers to make rope), to twist
